title: Be My Butterfly
description: Crime is uncommon in the small town of Wimberly. Fear doesn't live here and everything is picture perfect....until it isn't. A monster has moved in and is instilling panic into the residents. A first hand account of his time in this cozy hamlet is written here....carefully relishing every act of debauchery and violence. Hear from each of his victims and feel the raw power of their fear and suffering. A monster has moved in and he is hunting for butterflies to complete his collection. Trigger warnings Torture, rape, murder, explicit language
author: K.R. Kimble
